Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Annotation Types
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.foreach.across.core.events.AcrossEventPublisher
    use the Spring ApplicationEventPublisher instead
    com.foreach.across.core.database.HasSchemaConfiguration
    Since Across 1.1.2 SchemaConfiguration is defined as beans.
    com.foreach.across.core.events.ParameterizedAcrossEvent
    implement ResolvableTypeProvider directly
    com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.WebUiContext
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.AbstractWebUiContext
    com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.AbstractWebUiContextHandlerInterceptor
    com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.AbstractWebUiContextRegistry
    com.foreach.across.core.annotations.AcrossConditionCondition
    com.foreach.across.core.AcrossModuleSettings
    obsolete - favour the use of ConfigurationProperties - should be removed in 4.0.0 and Spring Boot Conditional implementations instead
    com.foreach.across.core.AcrossModuleSettingsRegistry
    since 1.1.2 - should be removed in 4.0.0
    com.foreach.across.test.AcrossTestContextConfiguration
    favour the use of an AcrossTestContextBuilder instead
    com.foreach.across.test.AcrossTestWebContextConfiguration
    com.foreach.across.modules.web.servlet.AcrossWebDynamicServletConfigurer
    in favour of FilterRegistrationBean or ServletRegistrationBean
    com.foreach.across.core.context.support.GenericAcrossModuleSettings
    com.foreach.across.core.convert.StringToDateConverter
    com.foreach.across.modules.web.table.Table
    com.foreach.across.modules.web.table.TableHeader
    com.foreach.across.modules.web.table.TableRow
  • Deprecated Annotation Types 
    Annotation Type and Description
    com.foreach.across.core.annotations.AcrossCondition
    use regular spring ConditionalOnExpression instead.
    com.foreach.across.core.annotations.AcrossEventHandler
    all beans are scanned for listeners since 2.0.0, should be removed in 4.0.0
    com.foreach.across.test.AcrossTestWebConfiguration
    since 1.1.2
    com.foreach.across.core.annotations.Event
    use the Spring standard EventListener instead
    com.foreach.across.core.annotations.EventName
    use EventListener.condition() instead
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.foreach.across.core.events.AcrossModuleBeforeBootstrapEvent.addApplicationContextConfigurers(ApplicationContextConfigurer...)
    use AcrossModuleBeforeBootstrapEvent.getBootstrapConfig() to alter the bootstrap configuration
    com.foreach.across.test.AcrossTestContext.beanRegistry()
    no longer useful as AcrossTestContext implements the bean registry interface directly
    com.foreach.across.core.AcrossModule.defaultExposeFilter()
    since 3.0.0 - replaced by across.configuration settings
    com.foreach.across.core.events.ParameterizedAcrossEvent.getEventGenericTypes()
    com.foreach.across.test.AbstractAcrossModuleConventionsTest.hasSettings()
    use of AcrossModuleSettings is deprecated in favor of Spring ConfigurationProperties
    com.foreach.across.modules.web.menu.PathBasedMenuBuilder.move(String, String)
    com.foreach.across.core.events.AcrossEventPublisher.publishAsync(AcrossEvent)
    users should provide their own async calling methods
    com.foreach.across.modules.web.AcrossWebModule.setSupportViews(AcrossWebViewSupport...)
    set via properties instead
    com.foreach.across.modules.web.AcrossWebModule.setViewsResourcePath(String)
    set via properties instead
    com.foreach.across.modules.web.menu.PathBasedMenuBuilder.undoMove(String)
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.foreach.across.test.AcrossTestContext(AcrossContextConfigurer...)
    use AcrossTestBuilders instead
    com.foreach.across.test.AcrossTestWebContext(AcrossContextConfigurer...)
    use AcrossTestBuilders instead
